title: Layer 1.5: Organizational Cartography - Org Mapping & Role Search
description: Add "Organizational Cartography" layer to WCTF framework, enabling discovery of VP orgs (peaks) and Director teams (rope teams), plus role search that maps to org structure. Roles and org mapping inform each other iteratively.
design:
## Architecture

### New Files
- `wctf_core/operations/orgmap.py` - Org mapping operations
- `wctf_core/operations/roles.py` - Role search with orgmap integration
- `.claude/commands/map-org.md` - /map-org slash command
- `.claude/commands/search-roles.md` - /search-roles slash command

### New Data Files
- `company.orgmap.yaml` - VP orgs (peaks) and Director teams (rope teams)
- `company.roles.yaml` - Open roles mapped to org structure

### Extended Files
- `wctf_core/models.py` - Add Pydantic models for Peak, RopeTeam, Role, etc.
- `wctf_core/client.py` - Add save_orgmap, get_orgmap, save_roles, get_roles methods

## Key Design Decisions

1. **Stage-agnostic**: Commands work at any stage, typical usage: orgmap at stage-2, roles at stage-3
2. **Separate files**: orgmap.yaml (slow-changing) vs roles.yaml (fast-changing)
3. **Iterative discovery**: Roles inform orgmap, orgmap enriches role understanding
4. **LLM-driven search**: Use WebSearch/WebFetch, SDK enforces structure/dedup
5. **Rich Pydantic models**: Validators + helpers + computed properties
6. **WCTF terminology**: "Peaks" (VP orgs), "Rope Teams" (Director teams)
acceptance_criteria:
- Can run /map-org {company} to create company.orgmap.yaml
- Can run /search-roles {company} to create company.roles.yaml
- Roles automatically link to orgmap peaks/rope_teams
- Unmapped roles trigger orgmap update suggestions
- All data validated by Pydantic models
- SDK prevents duplicate roles
- Commands work at any stage (not limited to stage-2 or stage-3)

title: Task 3: Add remaining orgmap Pydantic models
description: Add CoordinationSignals and InsiderConnection models to wctf_core/models_orgmap.py

title: Task 4: Add RopeTeam and Peak models with computed properties
description: Add RopeTeam and Peak models with computed fields: has_insider_connection, total_insider_connections
